channel.title: 508 Model adding help
channel.description:
okay so where do i add this in Applet_sub1.java?
[code]switch(i_3_) { case 3098: class19.anInt330 = 14998;//inventory/drop model class19.anInt336 = 738;//model zoom class19.anInt389 = 245;//modelRotation1 class19.anInt395 = 80;// model rotation 2 class19.anInt358 = -2;// model offset 1 class19.anInt391 = 3;// model offset 2 class19.anInt390 = 14997;//Male model id class19.aRSString_362 = Class112.method1668(43, "Dragon claws");//Item Name break; case 1121: class19.anInt330 = 44576;//inventory/drop model class19.anInt336 = 900;//model zoom class19.anInt389 = 0;//modelRotation1 class19.anInt395 = 0;// model rotation 2 class19.anInt358 = 0;// model offset 1 class19.anInt391 = 0;// model offset 2 class19.anInt390 = 40207;//Male model id class19.anInt347 = -1;//male sleeves class19.aRSString_362 = Class112.method1668(43, "Dragon platebody");//Item Name break; } [/code]
Help is appreciated.

item.title: 508 Model adding help
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

okay so where do i add this in Applet_sub1.java?

switch(i_3_) { case 3098: class19.anInt330 = 14998;//inventory/drop model class19.anInt336 = 738;//model zoom class19.anInt389 = 245;//modelRotation1 class19.anInt395 = 80;// model rotation 2 class19.anInt358 = -2;// model offset 1 class19.anInt391 = 3;// model offset 2 class19.anInt390 = 14997;//Male model id class19.aRSString_362 = Class112.method1668(43, "Dragon claws");//Item Name break; case 1121: class19.anInt330 = 44576;//inventory/drop model class19.anInt336 = 900;//model zoom class19.anInt389 = 0;//modelRotation1 class19.anInt395 = 0;// model rotation 2 class19.anInt358 = 0;// model offset 1 class19.anInt391 = 0;// model offset 2 class19.anInt390 = 40207;//Male model id class19.anInt347 = -1;//male sleeves class19.aRSString_362 = Class112.method1668(43, "Dragon platebody");//Item Name break; }
